name: puppeteer-pdf-generator
description: Lambda function to generate PDFs from web pages using Puppeteer

scripts.dev: npm run build && SKIP_S3=true API_KEY=dev-api-key node dist/dev-server.js
scripts.dev:s3: npm run build && API_KEY=dev-api-key node dist/dev-server.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build:clean && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-function.zip index.js core.js types.js && cd .. && zip -u lambda-function.zip package.json && zip -ur lambda-function.zip node_modules -x 'node_modules/puppeteer/*' 'node_modules/.cache/*' && aws s3 cp lambda-function.zip s3://pdf-storage-1/new/
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build:clean && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-function.zip index.js core.js types.js && cd .. && zip -u lambda-function.zip package.json && zip -ur lambda-function.zip node_modules -x 'node_modules/puppeteer/*' 'node_modules/.cache/*'
